alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 14 at 2:19PM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in a long duration event of 1 to 2 feet or more are possible in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Erie, Genesee, and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...The potential remains for a significant long duration lake effect snow event Thursday night through much of the weekend. There is still considerable uncertainty in exact band placement and amounts, but multiple periods of heavy snow are possible, including across the Buffalo metro area.
info.instruction: Narrow bands of very heavy snow are possible across portions of the region. Localized travel problems will be possible. Stay tuned for later forecasts and statements as we progress through this week.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
